components.description:
The flaky, golden-brown crescent of a croissant, a breakfast pastry associated with France and Austria.

The croissant emoji went viral on Tiktok in January 2023.
components.title: Croissant

description:
The flaky, golden-brown crescent of a croissant, a breakfast pastry associated with France and Austria.

The croissant emoji went viral on Tiktok in January 2023.
title: Croissant

version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Food symbol
emoji_net_data.definition: A pastry with a crescent shape. Popular in many countries, but most often associated with France, and Austria. Croissant was approved as par http://emojipedia.org/croissant/
emoji_net_data.name: croissant

bn:00103321a: Of or pertaining to France or the people of France
Of or relating to the people or culture of France.
Of or relating to the French people.
Of or pertaining to France, the French people.
Of or relating to Gaul or France.

bn:00088565v: Prepare food by cutting it into strips.
Cut (e.g, beans) lengthwise in preparation for cooking
To prepare food by cutting it into strips.

bn:00012873n: A staple food prepared by cooking a dough of flour and water and possibly more ingredients
A common food made mainly from flour, water and yeast and produced by kneading and baking a dough.
Food made from dough of flour or meal and usually raised with yeast or baking powder and then baked
Bread is a staple food prepared by baking a dough of flour and water.
Bread is a staple food prepared from a dough of flour and water, usually by baking.
A foodstuff made by baking dough made from cereals.

bn:00023751n: A croissant is a buttery, flaky, viennoiserie or Vienna-style pastry named for its well-known crescent shape.
A flaky roll or pastry in a form of a crescent.
A crescent-shaped biscuit or bread roll.

bn:00035650n: Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's croissant emoji is a delicious-looking pastry, rendered with a golden-brown, flaky exterior that suggests a satisfying crunch.  The 3D design on Apple devices showcases realistic lighting and soft gradients, highlighting the delicate layers and subtle sheen of the baked goods.  Its gently curved shape and inviting appearance make it a perfect symbol for breakfast, baking, or simply enjoying a sweet treat in digital conversations.
